AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND ID=#{search}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOBTALK(SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, READCOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_BBS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1, 0) FROM JOBTALK), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE JOBTALK SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=(SELECT REF FROM JOBTALK WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP>(SELECT STEP FROM JOBTALK WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
